short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to save the photos of a facebook post with their high quality as a PDF or a zip file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features
- Drag and drop to order the photos
- Rotate
- Add the caption and the link of the post
- Save as PDF or ZIP

You can download only the photos that have "Download" button enabled. 

Please note THIS IS NOT an official extension and IT IS NOT provided by Facebook.
